title: @Riot, have you ever considered promotional comics?
body: I don't want to start a LoL vs. DOTA debate, but they have repeatedly released comics when they release new skins, weapons, armor, and heroes. I'm not expecting you guys to do so with lore. At times I actually appreciate the videos, but things like skin teams, such as those Debonair, Safe Crackers, and the card theme, could make for an interesting comic to promote the skin lines.

replies.body: Not only have we considered it. We made one: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/ekko-comic/

You guys are evil when it comes to these posts, if I dont see the product ahead of time I would say both Narrative and Skins only release something when people post a thread asking about it lol. You guys did a great job, brings a lot more context to his video. Now if you only talked about jinx and vi with ekko
